description.summary: Role tightly connected to the Microsoft Software Developer group for issue & bug resolution.
Identified issues and implemented appropriate solutions to deliver quick and effective remediation.
Neatly gathered details/logs to identify bugs and shared the data with Engineering to release code fixes.
Wrote engineering reports to document potential trending issues that needed a code/service fix.
Professional responsible for the support, and enhancement of HP Inc infrastructure and support of HP Inc employees via phone, chat, and videoconference
Conferred with users and conducted computer diagnostics to investigate and resolve problems and to provide technical assistance and support.
Set up equipment for employee use, performed and ensured proper installation of the operating system and appropriate software.
Analyzed user needs and software requirements to determine feasibility of design within time and cost constraints.
Created data flow diagrams, use case diagrams and activity diagrams to define the ways customers interact with the software, and how the software responds to inputs.
Wrote well-designed and testable code in C# using an MVC architecture and OOP model coupled with a connection to a SQL server hosted on Azure.
Deployed the software to client computers and made sure it was working properly and trained users to use the new software.
Assisted DXC employees with various types of technical issues via email, live chat and telephone.
Read technical manuals, interacted with users and performed computer diagnostics to investigate and solve problems providing technical assistance and support.
Participated in the completion of the DXC migration program as part of the exit of DXC technology from HPE's IT services environment.
Managed escalations from senior management as a member of the escalations team.
Trained and mentored new service desk personnel and managed IT portion of employee onboarding process.
